title: Artificial intelligence ‘essential part of business’ say four in five Northern Ireland chiefs
description: Around four in five business chiefs here believe artificial intelligence (AI) should be an essential part of their businesses.
content:
And a greater number of chief executives here – 80% – believe AI is essential, over bosses in the Republic, on 63%.
That’s according to the latest KPMG CEO Outlook. It also shows fewer NI leaders (32%) expect to allocate 10–20% of budgets to AI over ... [1914 chars]

title: WhatsApp faces European antitrust investigation over artificial intelligence
description: LONDON (AP) — WhatsApp faces an antitrust investigation in the European Union, where regulators said Thursday that they're looking into the messaging service'
content:
LONDON (AP) — WhatsApp faces an antitrust investigation in the European Union, where regulators said Thursday that they’re looking into the messaging service’s artificial intelligence policy.

title: AI and the death of macroeconomics as we knew it
description: Artificial intelligence isn’t the end of macroeconomics. But it is the end of macroeconomics as we know it.

title: TV and film performers to vote on strike action over AI scanning

content:
TV and film performers are to vote on strike action over scanning for artificial intelligence (AI).
